basics.name: Siddharth Gelera (reaper)
basics.description:
I'm a Developer from Hyderabad, India interested in the wide variety of cool things that programming gives you the power to build.

I've spent 6 years in the industry working on Web Dev, Internal Tooling and Automation. In my own time, I build open source projects to kill my curiosity in fields and domains that my work doesn't allow me to.
I like to keep things simple and straightforward, so is my attitude.
basics.label: A Full Stack Developer that's better at talking to computers than humans.

work.name: Fountane, LLC
highlights: Helped bring the following projects to life.
Simplied development processes and improved the overall state of automation of the organization while also helping clients avoid the daily issues of running a tech based business
work.summary: Standardised Development Processes, trained developers, setup automations and maintained numerous projects

work.name: Valuefy Solutions Private Limited
highlights: Built the core transaction flow of a wealth management platform, both the UI and the backend/backoffice
Optimized the ETL and Analytics aggregation process for 1000+ users
Helped standardize creation of variants for the web app
work.summary: Core Contributor during the initial stages of the product

work.name: Cartisan
highlights: Trained and Helped interns to build a Damage Detection ML Model, for better invocing
Helped maintain the core product Cartisan; both as Frontend Developer (AngularJS) and Backend Developer ( MongoDB, Express)

work.name: Retailio
highlights: Built the Web UI for SuperTax, a tax management service with GST support which was written in React
Upgraded the Web UI for RetailIO's Medical Supply B2B product, which was done in Angular
work.summary: A junior dev who supported the senior developers in maitaining and launching 2 Products

work.name: HoppApp
highlights: Built driver tracking Web UI for the HoppApp service
work.summary: Core developer responsible for the Admin side of things for the Product
